name: Robert VIERHOUT
goal: Providing communication and public affairs advice to companies, NGOs and other third parties on European policy and regulatory matters.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Policies and rules on environment, transport, energy, agriculture, innovation and trade.
Special focus on renewable energy and circular economy.
